Text: Re EMCA the rood againCall Mike Bradley Bradley Roofing and Construction Tell him Kate Welch recommended him Original Message From Martha Brousseau To Sent Monday January AM Subject EMCA the rood again Hey everyone I know I asked about recommendations for a roofer a while back Hoping you will once again dig deep into the recesses of your brilliant minds and give us a name Thanks Martha To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service
